summary: Redesigned the Collaboration page hero section to improve symmetry and visual balance. Changes include: better vertical centering with flexbox justify-center, improved responsive spacing with responsive gaps (gap-12 lg:gap-16), enhanced image container with aspect ratio handling (4:3 on mobile, fixed 480px height on desktop), added padding adjustments (lg:pr-4 on text, lg:pl-4 on image) for better column balance, upgraded shadow from shadow-sm to shadow-lg, added subtle gradient overlay on image for depth, improved responsive typography scaling, and better spacing between text elements.
